datascience.name: Regression Models of Reaction Times
datascience.objective: Built a linear regression model to predict reaction times based on predictors of provided data
datascience.modelsAndConcepts: Linear Regression, sklearn, pandas, Train Test Split, KFold, Mean Squared Error, Accuracy Score, r2 score, Heteroskedasticity, Linear Assumption

datascience.name: Clustering Models - Part I
datascience.objective: Built and compared clustering models with generic data.
datascience.modelsAndConcepts: K-Means, Gaussian Mixture Models (with EM), DBSCAN, Hierarchical Clustering, sklearn, Pandas, Silhouette Scores, Nearest Neighbors, Elbow Method (Epsilon), Noise, Hyperparameters

datascience.name: Clustering Models - Part II
datascience.objective: Built and compared clustering models with nutrional data.
datascience.modelsAndConcepts: K-Means, Gaussian Mixture Models (with EM), DBSCAN, Hierarchical Clustering, sklearn, Pandas, Silhouette Scores, Nearest Neighbors, Elbow Method (Epsilon), Noise, Hyperparameters

datascience.name: Principle Component Analysis on Linear Regression Model
datascience.objective: Built a Linear Regression Model without and with PCA to compare and analyze their results.
datascience.modelsAndConcepts: Linear Regression, Principle Component Analysis (PCA), Mean Squared Error, r2 score, Accuracy Score, sklearn, pandas, Train Test Split

datascience.name: Final Project utilizing Supervised & Unsupervised Machine Learning Models
datascience.objective: Using a movie dataset from Kaggle, build the relevant ML models to answer the different questions and provide analysis about movies.
datascience.modelsAndConcepts: Supervised ML, Unsupervised ML, Principle Component Analysis (PCA), Regression Models, Clustering Models, Performance Metrics, sklearn, pandas
